pages.text: The Sunlight Flower is a truly remarkable plant, endowed with a range of unique properties. Not only does its blossom emit light, but its petals are also essential in certain specific recipes. This tall flower grows under the open sky and only during the day. $(br2)Its rare seeds can be found in $(6)deserts$(), which were once home to thousands of these flowers.
The magnificent beauty of the Sunlight Flower, nourished by the energy of the sun.
